verses.text: And if his oblation \add shall be\add* a sacrifice of peace-offering, if he shall offer \add it\add* of the herd, whether a male or female; he shall offer it without blemish before the LORD.

And he shall lay his hand upon the head of his offering, and kill it \add at\add* the door of the tabernacle of the congregation: and Aaron's sons the priests shall sprinkle the blood upon the altar round about.
And he shall offer of the sacrifice of the peace-offering, an offering made by fire to the LORD; the fat that covereth the inwards, and all the fat that \add is\add* upon the inwards,
And the two kidneys, and the fat that \add is\add* on them, which \add is\add* by the flanks, and the caul above the liver, with the kidneys, it shall he take away.

And Aaron's sons shall burn it on the altar, upon the burnt-sacrifice which \add is\add* upon the wood that \add is\add* on the fire: \add it is\add* an offering made by fire, of a sweet savor to the LORD.
And if his offering for a sacrifice of peace-offering to the LORD shall be \add of\add* the flock, male or female; he shall offer it without blemish.
If he shall offer a lamb for his offering, then shall he offer it before the LORD.
And he shall lay his hand upon the head of his offering, and kill it before the tabernacle of the congregation: and Aaron's sons shall sprinkle the blood of it around upon the altar.

And he shall offer of the sacrifice of the peace-offering an offering made by fire to the LORD: its fat, \add and\add* the whole rump, that shall he take off hard by the back-bone; and the fat that covereth the inwards, and all the fat that \add is\add* upon the inwards,
And the two kidneys, and the fat that \add is\add* upon them, which \add is\add* by the flanks, and the caul above the liver, with the kidneys, that shall he take away.
And the priest shall burn it upon the altar: \add it is\add* the food of the offering made by fire to the LORD.
And if his offering \add shall be\add* a goat, then he shall offer it before the LORD.
And he shall lay his hand upon the head of it, and kill it before the tabernacle of the congregation: and the sons of Aaron shall sprinkle its blood upon the altar round about.
And he shall offer of it his offering, \add even\add* an offering made by fire to the LORD; the fat that covereth the inwards, and all the fat that \add is\add* upon the inwards,
And the two kidneys, and the fat that \add is\add* upon them, which \add is\add* by the flanks, and the caul above the liver, with the kidneys, that shall he take away.
And the priest shall burn them upon the altar: \add it is\add* the food of the offering made by fire for a sweet savor: all the fat \add is\add* the LORD'S.
\add It shall be\add* a perpetual statute for your generations throughout all your dwellings, that ye eat neither fat nor blood.
